name: Golf Cart Drive
description: Casual golf cart driving experience for PC. Drive around, go for jumps, or enjoy the scenery in this fun driving experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual Core 3.2 GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 3.1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 240 / nVidia GeForce GT 740 Storage: 186 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0
